comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I might be wrong, but this is not a new idea whatsoever. There have been already some discussions on using Blockchain technology and assymetric cryptography in order to enhance free and fair elections. Though, I myself have some doubts on whether the average citizen would be ready to use their private keys responsibly and not lose them permanently.Also, since this project of yours is also about an utility token/coin, I believe it would fit better on the Alternative Coin section instead of here. People interested in new/promising project generally participate there. So don't be surprised if some moderator decides to take the initiative and move this thread to said section. Good luck and have a good day.
